p: The treatment of streptozocin diabetic guinea pig or rats with fruit extract from pomegranate showed a marked hypoglycemic effect. It improved glucose homeostasis by restoring the level of glycogen, elevated hepatic glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase activity, improved total protein level, improved blood urea nitrogen and creatinine levels, reduced serum levels of total cholesterol and triglycerides, and enhanced the antioxidant activity in treated animals [ 247].
